ingredients.item: 400g can essential Waitrose Mixed Bean Salad, drained and rinsed
395g can essential Waitrose Red Kidney Beans In Chilli Sauce
350g tub essential Waitrose Tomato & Chilli Sauce

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ÂºC, gas mark 6. Grease a 1kg loaf tin.
Place both cans of beans in a food processor with the egg, breadcrumbs and parsley and blitz until coarse. Spread into the prepared tin and bake for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, heat the sauce in a small saucepan for 1-2 minutes. Slice the loaf and serve with the sauce and green beans.
